_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Sonarqube app
author: contact@funixgaming.fr

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# SonarQube Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

echo -e "installing dependencies"
apt-get -y update
apt-get install -y wget unzip

## add user
echo -e "adding container user"
useradd -d /home/container -m container -s /bin/bash

## own server to container user
chown container: /mnt/server/

cd /mnt/server

if [ -d "sonarqube" ]; then
    rm -rf sonarqube
fi

wget https://binaries.sonarsource.com/Distribution/sonarqube/sonarqube-8.9.9.56886.zip && unzip sonarqube-*.zip
mv sonarqube-*/ sonarqube
rm sonarqube-*.zip

rm -rf sonarqube/conf/sonar.properties

echo "sonar.jdbc.username=${DB_USERNAME}" >> sonarqube/conf/sonar.properties
echo "sonar.jdbc.password=${DB_PASSWORD}" >> sonarqube/conf/sonar.properties
echo "sonar.jdbc.url=jdbc:postgresql://${DB_HOSTNAME}:${DB_PORT}/${DB_DATABASE_NAME}" >> sonarqube/conf/sonar.properties
echo "sonar.web.port=${SERVER_PORT}" >> sonarqube/conf/sonar.properties
echo "sonar.web.host=0.0.0.0" >> sonarqube/conf/sonar.properties
